page.title: 06My Place in Frogmore.
page.content: I live in a beautiful house because it is in a quiet village called Frogmore. I like my bedroom because when I look out of the window I can see my garden with the sun shining through the window. Sometimes mummy and daddy let me walk to the village shop to get things. Sometimes my neighbour takes me out in his boat. We've got a big garden and I play in it quite a lot. We've got a sand pit and a rope ladder to play on. We've got two apple trees and three plum trees, a blackcurrant bush and strawberries. We've got four animals, two dogs and two cats. One of our dogs used to tunnel under the fence and walk down to our neighbour's house and mummy had to fetch it back.
